description: The Cerveceria La Trocha, established by former combatants as part of Colombia's peace agreement, is a community-driven initiative focused on promoting peace and supporting local economies. With a team of dedicated workers, it operates a brewery and offers various artisanal products, fostering collaboration with local artists and institutions. The initiative emphasizes workers' rights, sustainability, and collective growth, aiming to create a supportive environment for both signatories and victims of the conflict.
name: Cerveceria La Trocha
